fields.description: Replace ntpd with Chrony for better time synchronization across our infrastructure. NTP warning has been a headache for support cases with not much resolution steps that we can offer. Chrony is a more modern and chosen library  for time synchronization used in many LInux distros and a more modern.
fields.releaseNote:
* `chrony` is replacing `ntp` for time synchronization
* bat-signal does not listens on port 123 anymore - chrony is only accepting requests via UNIX socket
